name: Alvin Alaphat
text: My boys AO, Hill, and Marcus served me up good. Makes me want to come back. Highly recommend this place. These guys don't disappoint.

name: nick henry
text: Really good pizza, quick and fresh. Highly recommend!

name: Mike Cooney
text: Decent pizza but poor service,  staff definitely acted put out to be making pizza for people.   They stopped serving drinks "for our safety" and have gone to bottles only but were out of basically everything and gave no indication of that ‚Ä¶More

name: #2cyclebiker Aric Street
text: Excellent.   The vegetarian and vegan options for toppings are making the pizza..supreme.  You can control the amount of toppings by asking and you can get a thicker crust...called high rise.  Nowhere I've ever been beats this place even though they may have great pizza. (Like Eastof Chicago P.)

name: Samantha Snyder
text: Really good atmosphere and really good pizza. The workers were all really nice. I highly recommend!

name: Dalton Dodson
text: Amazing pizza and amazing costing pizza. Alex is the man, great conversationalist and even greater service. My past experiences with the customer service was sub par at best but Alex was on top of it! He is an exemplary employee.

name: Michael Siracusa
text: This was my first time at this location. The food is reasonably priced. I know that pizza can be very subjective because everybody loves certain things on their Pizza. This is one of the few pizza chains that topped your pizza right in ‚Ä¶More

name: Reginald Sanders
text: Awesome üçï, love that u can create your own, make it right in front of u, extra toppings don't cost anything

name: Amber Dillard
text: sitting down with my family, when the the  atmosphere was rudely Abrupted by apparently a employee and a bf coming in their yelling and screaming at another employee which she kindly asked them to go out back. the manager said this was not ‚Ä¶More

name: scott stassen
text: Great service. Good quick pizza

name: Zach
text: Hill is the man! I always get a great pie and friendly service when he‚Äôs in there. Looking forward to coming back.

name: China and Jayden Revivews
text: Great staff! Amazing pizza

name: Bo Turner
text: Love Blaze chain. Clean and friendly staff! Like the half pizza for only $5 til 4pm. Great deal. The spicy sauce is my favorite and I like how you can put as many protein and veggies on top for no extra cost

name: Adel Al
text: Best pizza in the area. It was Tasty and crunchy and totally affordable. üëçüèª

name: Bert Bader
text: Placed an online order to be picked up at 12:50pm. Was told it would be ready in 20-25 minutes. Arrived at 1:15 and none of the 3 pizzas ordered had even been started.  It was not busy and they appear fully staffed.  Not a single acknowledgement or apology.

name: Amber Mustard
text: We love Blaze! They are always super friendly and careful with those of us with dairy allergies!

name: Ella Liskey
text: this is NOT GLUTEN FREE!!! i went here with my family and my mom saw that they used the same pizza roller on the non gluten free pizza and the gluten pizza. that is not safe for some people. I will not be coming back here ever again. very dissapointed

name: Hogfan 97
text: Friendly staff. Be specific with how you like your pizza. Don't blame them if it's not perfect to your exact preference if you don't communicate

name: A7an Rijjal
text: I am a regular customer at the Blaze pizza on Eddy Street in South Bend. I am there frequently because enjoy customizing my pizza. In addition, the staff is friendly although they have large turnover in their employees. What has been ‚Ä¶More

name: Brantley Botham
text: It was so cozy, and inviting and I couldn't wait to dig into the menu. I ordered an iced tea and asked for sweetener, and my server told me she would make a simple syrup mixture for me so it would blend easier in the drink. I love that! Simple touches that are thoughtful, and make your visit so much better.

name: Sophia Mason
text: I ordered online ahead of time. Two of the pizzas were fine, but for one of them I hardly got any broccoli. Not even every slice got one piece of broccoli. Smh.

name: Aiden Meredith
text: Conveniently located little pizza place that was less than half a mile from the football stadium. The staff were friendly, and the service was fast, even though the line was barely through the door. I got the cheese and pepperoni pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: crystal miller
text: Worst service I‚Äôve ever had at a blaze pizza! No greeting when we walked in, she asked what we wanted & then just walked away. Finally a gal came to make our pizzas, (not friendly at all!) she was definitely new & didn‚Äôt even know the ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Miller
text: 45 minutes from my house and totally worth the drive!!!  Love me some Blaze!

name: Sakshi Bhardwaj
text: I visited the Blaze Pizza,South bend on June 15, 2020. No doubt the pizza was good but no social distancing was maintained. Staff was wearning mask but mask was not covering thier nose and was hanging on the chin. To my surpise, one of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Czr 574
text: Vegan cheese,  vegan toppings,  vegan pizza. Love it.

name: Brandon Fry

text: Very good pizza and very great cook

name: Sharnae J
text: Fast service and awesome pizza

name: Pedro Morales
text: best pizza , great costumer service .

name: Jay vini

name: Aaron Wilker
text: Good for a quick bite to eat. Prices are good and portions are good too. You split a pie two ways, get a drink and dough knots for 11 dollars.

name: Ariana Hill
text: This is a terrible place. We walked in to the manager yelling at the workers and then being so rude the whole time. My whole family (6 people) also got the wrong pizzas.

name: n o h a
text: one star, would nit recommend, did not get my pizza.  i did not order or pay but i still didnt get it. im very upset.

Amazing as always. Hill was very helpful Mia ,

name: Robert Chodzinski
text: Very good. A bit pricey. But you pay for quality.

name: Vickie Bryan
text: Very welcoming. Explained  the menu  well. The califlower crust was good.

name: Gabe A
text: If you like small paper thin pizza that doesn't fill you up then this is the place to go.

name: Michael Tan
text: Nice pizza and would have gotten 5 stars if the older fellow making the pizza was nicer....

name: Lindsay Marquette
text: I love the amazing options of pizza they have. It's great that there is something for everyone.

name: Liya Blitzer
text: Decent place to get some pizza. Isn't the best Blaze I've been to, but they still have a variety of options to eat. Sometimes my pizza is cooked perfectly, but sometimes my pizza is burnt. The customer service varies depending on who is working.

name: Kent McKesson
text: Great pizza, fresh toppings and made to order.  Cooked fast but not cheaply.   No half baked doughy crust.  A little bit hipster, but damn good thin crust pizza.

name: Michael Casey
text: Loved this place and their service. Super chill and delicious!

name: Jamie McCreery
text: Gave it a go and it was better than I expected :)

name: Zoie Adams
text: Male middle aged man with glasses (manager) looks Greasy and is very rude to his employees.

name: Lan Li
text: My husband picked up the 20$ DIY for family 4 pizza dough. It‚Äôs so tiny, my husband even asked them, they said just cut it into four will be working. NO WAY! It‚Äôs might just be for 2 toddlers! Disappointed!

name: Thomas Terrance
text: My wife and I came into blaze this evening, our first time to have dinner. It was amazing, great quality pizza and a wonderful staff. We were checked on multiple times during our visit by Journey. The lobby was Very clean and and bathrooms ‚Ä¶More

name: Wesley Mock
text: First off, I am not giving this 1 Star because the manager or employees did not do their job. When I came in, it was after 10pm, a large line and I waited patiently for my turn to come. There were only 3 people working. Though it wasn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Randall
text: Good atmosphere and people. Not traditional pizza for sure. More of a healthy lower calorie pizza unless you choose the thicker crust options. Very light on the cheese but the toppings are rich in flavor. For drinks, they have pop and juice. The juice is watered down so you don't have to worry about drinking large quantities of it.

name: Natalie Ross
text: I called to wish everyone a great night and order a pizza and she was being very disrespectful and after i wished everyone a good night she said it was very inapproprite thing to say and hung up! Dont know if i will be ordering there again! The worst thing is that she never let me order my pizza.

name: Jim Fredwell
text: This was a very bad first experience at Blaze for my family.  I have been there before but never has it been this bad. The cashier was very rude after we advised that she added 2 more pizzas on our order than we had.  Trash was overflowing, ‚Ä¶More

name: Haley Marie
text: Such a great deal for a BYO pizza. I prefer Blaze over pie five any day

name: Aaron Hall
text: Great food and service. The employees are very nice and make great pizza! Very chill atmosphere with okay music. Would definitely be back again. Favorite pizza spot!

name: Noah Wyatt
text: The menu and pricing was a tad confusing at first, but the employees were very helpful and explained the while process.  After the order was placed, it was prepared and ready in almost no time at all.  Wide variety of quality toppings, delicious crust, and friendly atmosphere.

name: Jesse Arndt
text:
I'm in awe of a place that can accommodate my vegan friend and my carnivorous me. Online ordering is simple and hassle free. Good work team!
We also love dining in. Its fun to watch the pizzas being made in front of you.

name: Andrew Butterface
text: I used Doordash. The food came 30 minutes late, burnt, and tasting worse than a frozen pizza. I'm pretty disappointed.

name: Adrian Clark
text: My experiences at Blaze Pizza are always great each and every time I go into the Eddy Street Commons location in particular. There is one person that is especially exceptional, Jazzy. She delivers an outstanding customer experience by ‚Ä¶More

name: Louise Williams
text: This place is ridiculous for late night food. They prioritize online orders at the expense of walk in customers. There was a queue only three people deep and after more than 20 minutes the line hadn't moved at all. When we asked the ‚Ä¶More

name: James Zieber
text: Food is amazing! But they have to be the slowest place in South Bend.

name: Brian Johnson
text: Very hard to beat the quality of ingredients here. Everything is so tasty and you get to make your pizza your way, with tons of options. Just a fun experience that allows you to experiment and mix and match plenty of ingredients you like and somehow it always ends up delicious. If you want a new spin on pizza, this is the place to be.

name: Tammy Mccloud
text: There gluten free crust is soo goodüòä Ty took my order and was very lively and helped me all the way down. I didn‚Äôt get the another young lady name who helped but she accommodated and worked with me. I love this location. Store was clean ‚Ä¶More

name: Lahoma Willis
text: Luv build your own pizza.. A nice casual date. Great beverage selection as well.

name: Pamela Minoski Runac
text: Like the thin original crust and the selections of toppings.  Also liked the 'finishes' at no charge. We selected arugula and olive oil drizzle. Yum!

text: Have you ever been to Subway or Chipotle? Same concept but with pizza! Except at Blaze, they make the horrible mistake of charging about 9 bucks for you to put any amount of anything they offer on your pizza. The catch? There is no catch! ‚Ä¶More

text: Get the night workers some help. I was there for an hour and a half waiting for my pizza that just never came. These people are stressed and cant work as effectively. Raise your wages to lure people in its obvious to see you have enough business. You have lost mine for good dont loose more from these bad experiences.

text: I love blaze the food is always so good. The service was nice and prompt.

text: The staff were very attentive and friendly. Love that! The pizza was good, too! Great experience!

text: While visiting Notre Dame campus on an overcast chilly day we popped into Blaze. We always love Blaze but this place is special. Of course the pizza is delicious but the staff and vibe of this location is exceptional.  Thanks for the great food, excellent customer service and clean friendly place to regroup.

name: Patricia Baker
text: My favorite pizza place ! Love the different options and also the vegan choices !! So many to choose from. Shoutout to Hill, Shyla, Crystal and the rest of their team !! You guys are the best

name: CoJp Biek

text: Unbelievably rude, employees using foul language, your questions will be answered with "I already told you...", when you try to make sure you understood.  Horrible!

text: GREAT pizza & very affordable!üòâü§òüèº

name: Tonaye Triplett
text: The staff was extremely friendly, especially Jazzmon! I was in and out with no problems. I highly recommend going there. Plus the pizza is good.

name: Kathryn Hein
text: Always fun and friendly staff, great food, and an easy-to-understand menu. I love going here with family, friends, on dates, or even just by myself. It's a great location, too, just off campus, with the energy of college and still a chill atmosphere.

name: Chrissy S Chrissy
text: They have a wonderful keto crust...and it is truly low carb. Like net 2 carbs per slice of crust. Also, high in protein.  Just a warning, you'll have the farts for about an hour after you eat it, but it's worth the farts if you can have some pizza.

name: Chesare D
text: Good place, toppings are good, place was clean and time is standard. The pizza came in thin, medium size only, which is good for 1.3 people aprox. Price is according with the place and service $$. There is public parking available near by. Yes I'll come back.

name: Libby Reed
text: Tasty and great service!

name: Rxzh√≠
text: Juju is the best. I love when she makes my üçï. That makes my day.

name: Kim Taylor

name: Diana Sanchez
text: Was very very good. Will go again

name: jared Blood
text: The food is amazing. Hands down the best place to get pizza in South Bend. Everything is very reasonably priced, staff are great at their job and are fast working and friebdly. If you want good pizza and don't go to Blaze's Pizza, then I can promise you it's not that good.

name: Margie Martin
text: Super Happy! Best Pizza around! Their Gluten Free crust beats anyone else's I've had so far. Juju was awesome friendly and professional and made the perfect pizza.  Happy to come back and bring some friends!

name: Lucy Mcman
text: Ty and Jozzy were great tonight!!  Super nice and funny. Pizza quality is A1, I recommend to anyone this is the best pizza in the city!

name: Elizabeth Dickens
text: My husband and I are picky about our pizza.   We loved the build your own style.   Prices are definitely reasonable.   When I went on vacation to Texas this year was the first time I had a pizza like this from a different chain.   When I was telling a friend about it she turned me on to this place.   I'll definitely be back.

name: Tanya Moore
text: Great pizza, friendly & fast staff! I enjoyed eating dinner here this weekend. Shout out to Jozzy Christie Hill and Crystal.

name: Bobby Baer

name: Deanna McCracken

text:
Painfully slow.
I ordered a simple pie. Went to the bathroom came back and paid for our pizzas. Somehow they lost my pizza, as in they never made it. How does that happen?
